name: GetModelManifestAX2012
friendlyName: Export a Model manifest from AX 2012
description: Does Export a Model manifest from an AX 2012 Environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: manifestFileName
inputs.label: Manifest file path (*.txt, .xml)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to save the model manifest file.

inputs.name: outputType
inputs.label: Output type
inputs.helpMarkDown: What should the output format be?

inputs.name: sourceType
inputs.label: Source type
inputs.helpMarkDown: What should the source type be?

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: modelName
inputs.label: Model name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the model. (Not allowed if a minifest file path is set)

inputs.name: modelFileName
inputs.label: Model file path (.axmodel)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the ax model file.

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - Export a Model manifest from AX 2012: $(manifestFileName)
